short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily save pictures on the page to Pinterest, you can save all pictures with one click
short.zh_CN: 方便、快捷地收藏页面上的图片到Pinterest，可一键收藏所有图片

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When saving to Pinterest, you can choose to save it immediately, or add it to the pin-queue. Adding to the pin-queue will save one image every minute, which can avoid being penalized by Pinterest for frequent saves. Unfinished collections will automatically continue after the browser restarts.
long.zh_CN: 收藏到Pinterest的时候可以选择立即收藏，或者添加到收藏队列。添加到收藏队列会每分钟收藏一张，可以避免因收藏频繁受到Pinterest处罚。浏览器重启后会自动继续没完成的收藏。
